All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable, WMInterface
public class WumpusMonitor
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements WMInterface, java.io.Serializable, Constants

A monitor for the wumpus server.

See Also:

enabled

private boolean enabled
Indicates whether this monitor is enabled. It's enabled automatically when it receives the first call to currentWorld from the server.

addImage

private void addImage(int row,
                      int col,
                      java.lang.String imageName,
                      java.lang.String imageFileName)
Adds an image to one of the rooms.
Parameters:
row - the row of the room
col - the column of the room
imageName - the name of the image to be added.
imageFileName - the name of the file containing the image.

checkImage

private boolean checkImage(int row,
                           int col,
                           java.lang.String imageName)
Checks if there is such a image in the given room.
Parameters:
row - the row of the room
col - the column of the room
imageName - the name of the image to be checked.
Returns:
true if there is a image with the given name in the room; false otherwise.

                         int left,
                         int bottom,
                         int right)
Checks whether to show a stench image in some region of the world.
Parameters:
top - the top row
left - the left column
bottom - the bottom row
right - the right column

currentWorld

public void currentWorld(WumpusWorld world)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Receives an update of the entire world. It will be invoked once in the beginning of the communication, and once in a while, to resynchronize in case of lost packages.
Specified by:
currentWorld in interface WMInterface
Parameters:
world - the world as is in the current state.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if there is an error in the communication.

killed

public void killed(Agent agent)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Receives an indication that an agent was killed. If the agent had the gold, then the gold should be available in the same room of the agent.
Specified by:
killed in interface WMInterface
Parameters:
agent - the agent that was killed.

setCrossed

private void setCrossed(int row,
                        int col,
                        java.lang.String imageName)
Crosses out an image panel. Used to indicate that an agent was killed.
Parameters:
row - the row of the room
col - the column of the room
imageName - the name of the image whose panel is to be modified.

Sets the direction of a directional panel.

row - the row of the room
col - the column of the room
imageName - the name of the image whose panel is to be modified.
direction - the new direction.
